body_html:
@PinkySan Please refer to this doc to build TF on windows:
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources_windows

You should not be building libtensorflow_cc.so on windows.
However, the problem you are facing is due to missing packages on your system
/usr/bin/bash: patch: Could not find command
Please see the bazel installation instructions, and make sure you follow all the steps.

Looks like the initial report is missing vital information, and later reported issues do not seem to fully relate to the original issue.
Closing until we get the detailed information we need to debug.

body:
@PinkySan Please refer to this doc to build TF on windows:
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources_windows

You should not be building libtensorflow_cc.so on windows.
However, the problem you are facing is due to missing packages on your system
`/usr/bin/bash: patch: Could not find command`
Please see the bazel installation instructions, and make sure you follow all the steps.

Looks like the initial report is missing vital information, and later reported issues do not seem to fully relate to the original issue.
Closing until we get the detailed information we need to debug.
